title: Instructing Your Children Throughout the Day
itunes:author: Guests: Joe Battaglia & Joe Pellegrino
itunes:summary: It's frustrating to feel like you're competing with electronic devices for your child's full attention. John and Danny discuss how fathers can take an active role in teaching their children. Receive the book Fathers Say with your gift of any amount!
description: It's frustrating to feel like you're competing with electronic devices for your child's full attention. John and Danny discuss how fathers can take an active role in teaching their children. Receive the book Fathers Say with your gift of any amount!
